column1: The Purple Pig////It's a tapas place that also has a wide variety of wines
column2: cheeses and meats to choose from. We had a few different dishes. The choripan panini was chorizo with carmelized onions. We also got the beets. I've never eaten beets before
column3: but when I saw that it came with whipped goat cheese
column5: I had to try it. I have no plans to eat more beets in the future
column6: but it was a pretty good
